00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.FileOpener;
00004 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00005 import liquibase.exception.SetupException;
00006 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00007 import liquibase.util.MD5Util;
00008 import liquibase.util.StreamUtil;
00009 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00011 
00012 import java.io.FileInputStream;
00013 import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
00014 import java.io.IOException;
00015 import java.io.InputStream;
00016 import java.util.Set;
00017 import java.util.logging.Logger;
00018 
00030 public class SQLFileChange extends AbstractSQLChange {
00031     private static final Logger log = LogFactory.getLogger();
00032     private String file;
00033     private String encoding = null;
00034     
00035     
00036     public SQLFileChange() {
00037         super("sqlFile", "SQL From File");
00038     }
00039 
00040     public String getPath() {
00041         return file;
00042     }
00043 
00049     public void setPath(String fileName) {
00050         file = fileName;
00051     }
00052     
00057                 public String getEncoding()
00058                 {
00059                         return encoding;
00060                 }
00061 
00065                 public void setEncoding(String encoding)
00066                 {
00067                         this.encoding = encoding;
00068                 }
00069 
00070                 public void setUp() throws SetupException {
00071         if (file == null) {
00072             throw new SetupException("<sqlfile> - No path specified");
00073         }
00074         log.fine("SQLFile file:" + file);
00075         boolean loaded = loadFromClasspath(file);
00076         if(!loaded) {
00077             loaded = loadFromFileSystem(file);
00078         }
00079         
00080         if (!loaded) {
00081             throw new SetupException("<sqlfile path="+file+"> - Could not find file");
00082         }
00083         log.finer("SQLFile file contents is:" + getSql());
00084     }
00085 
00092     private boolean loadFromFileSystem(String file) throws SetupException {
00093 
00094         FileInputStream fis = null;
00095         try {
00096             fis = new FileInputStream(file);
00097             setSql( StreamUtil.getStreamContents(fis, encoding) );
00098             return true;
00099         } catch (FileNotFoundException fnfe) {
00100             return false;
00101         } catch (IOException e) {
00102             throw new SetupException("<sqlfile path="+file+"> -Unable to read file", e);
00103         } finally {
00104             if (fis != null) {
00105                 try {
00106                     fis.close();
00107                 } catch (IOException ioe) {//NOPMD
00108                     // safe to ignore
00109                 }
00110             }
00111         }
00112 
00113     }
00114 
00124     private boolean loadFromClasspath(String file) throws SetupException {
00125         InputStream in = null;
00126         try {
00127             FileOpener fo = getFileOpener();
00128             if(fo== null) {
00129                 return false;
00130             }
00131             
00132             in = fo.getResourceAsStream(file);
00133             if (in == null) {
00134                 return false;
00135             }
00136             setSql( StreamUtil.getStreamContents(in, encoding));
00137             return true;
00138         } catch (IOException ioe) {
00139             throw new SetupException("<sqlfile path="+file+"> -Unable to read file", ioe);
00140         } finally {
00141             if (in != null) {
00142                 try {
00143                     in.close();
00144                 } catch (IOException ioe) {//NOPMD
00145                     // safe to ignore
00146                 }
00147             }
00148         }
00149     }
00150     
00156     public String getMD5Sum() {
00157         return MD5Util.computeMD5(getSql());
00158     }
00159 
00160     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogDOM) {
00161         Element sqlElement = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement("sqlFile");
00162         sqlElement.setAttribute("path", file);
00163         if (encoding != null) {
00164                 sqlElement.setAttribute("encoding", encoding);
00165         }
00166         return sqlElement;
00167     }
00168 
00169     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00170         return "SQL in file " + file + " executed";
00171     }
00172 
00173 
00174     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00175         return null;
00176     }
